## Overview

TICA is a model being develop to estimate deforestation, land use transitions, and their impact on social and environmental aspects of the Cerrado and Amaz√¥nia biomes in Brazil. This model is part of an effort to develop an interdisciplinary approach to analyse these phenomena.

## Installation

You can install the development version of TICA from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hugotseixas/tica")
```
